description: This file contains the implementation of back-end APIs for managing Router Advertisement (RA) interfaces within a COSA Data Model framework. It includes functions for creating, initializing, removing, and registering RA interfaces and options, along with detailed interactions with persistent storage via folder operations and the management of interface and option data structures.

classes.name: COSA_DATAMODEL_RA
classes.description: Data structure representing the entire Router Advertisement (RA) module, including interface list and folder pointers.

classes.name: COSA_DML_RA_IF_FULL2
classes.description: Data structure representing a full RA interface entry with associated options list.

classes.name: COSA_DML_RA_OPTION
classes.description: Data structure representing a RA interface option.

classes.name: COSA_CONTEXT_LINK_OBJECT
classes.description: Context structure used for managing linked list entries of interfaces and options, including instance numbers, context handles, and pointer references.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CosaRACreate(VOID)
methods.description: Constructs and returns a new instance of the RA data model object, setting up function pointers and initial state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaRAInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the RA object by setting up folder references, reading existing entries from persistent storage, assigning instance numbers, and populating internal data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaRARemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Performs cleanup of the RA object, freeing all allocated memory, and removing folder entries.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaRaRegGetInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Reads RA interface entries from persistent storage and populates internal data structures accordingly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaRARegAddInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Registers a new RA interface or option, creating folder structures and records in persistent storage.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaRARegDelInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Removes RA interface or option data from persistent storage, cleaning up folder records.

ctags.name: CosaRARegAddInfo
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
